message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset that will bring significant value to your business. My initial offer is $12,000. What are your thoughts?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $10,500?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to make a deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $12,750. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  While I see the value in the product, I'm working with a tight budget. Would you consider $11,000?  I think this is a fair compromise.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $13,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great value for the product. What do you think?

Hi Alice, thanks for your counteroffer.  I understand this is your lowest price, but it's still a bit outside my budget. I can offer $11,500.  If that doesn't work, I may need to explore other options.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal possible, but I'm not willing to go as high as $11,500. I'm willing to make one final concession, so I'm counteroffering at $13,500. This is the absolute lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great value for the product. If you're not interested, I'd be happy to discuss other options with you.
